attributes.action: Have more 'Proms in the Park' events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year I could not attend such an event as I already had too much school work. There are currently only five 'Proms in the Park' events throughout the UK. However there are many 'blind spots'. I think that if events were organised in places for example Edinburgh or Newcastle then many more people could attend.

Thankyou

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
